job.title: Android Software Engineer - Kotlin - Java
job.description:
If you are a Android Software Engineer with Kotlin experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
We are thrilled to announce we are looking for talented Software Android Application Engineer to help us in our continuous growth and goals of launching new and exciting electronic products!
Seeking an Android Software Engineer mid level with at least 3 years experience.
Base salary, $75K -$105K and DOE . . . .
We are fast paced, innovative and like to hire the best talent we can find to join our elite team! If you are looking to work with hot technology, a great team and company, this is the giant leap in your career path!
What You Will Be Doing
In this key role, you will be responsible for designing and maintaining software for our State of the Art electronics products in a fun and collaborative software environment!
Responsible for designing, creating, and maintaining software for multi-function electronics products with a focus on Android development in an AOSP framework. -Work with a globally distributed team environment.
What You Need for this Position
Experience developing Android applications
Full software lifecycle in an agile environment
Strong Kotlin and Java experience
A desire to work with Kotlin as a primary language
Android NDK and native code integration experience
Familiarity with a DevOps environment, CI, unit & automated testing, TDD
Experience with full system debugging
Mid-level experience: 3+ years of real-world development experience
Experience with modern C++ highly desired
Excellent communication skills.
Candidates must be self-motivated, able to work independently on complex systems, and adapt to new application areas.
Big Pluses
Experience with design patterns such as MVVM, MVP
Experience with Android AOSP
Qt framework experience
What's In It for You
Our location is beautiful, vibrant, and the cost of living is inexpensive! Great people are here! You will be part of hot technology with a top-notched engineering team and company! If you like to be mentally stimulated, then this is the place! Great products and a stable company that is growing!
Vacation/PTO
Medical
Dental
Vision
Bonus
401(k)
Competitive Base Salary and DOE
Relocation assistance
